titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the benefits and importance of school-based music education.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

bill.summary:
5/7/2007--Introduced.
Expresses the sense of Congress that music education grounded in rigorous instruction is an important component of a well-rounded academic curriculum and should be available to every student in every school in the United States.
